data.title: Traders Turn Bullish on Communication Services Sector
data.text: The communication services sector generally gets overlooked by most retail traders, but it could be the group to watch in 2020.

data.title: Instagram will now ask new users to provide their age
data.text: Nearly a decade after its launch, Instagram is finally taking the basic step of asking people signing up for the service to provide their age in an attempt to better protect younger users.

data.title: Beware these two FANG stocks as markets bounce back, traders warn
data.text: FANG stocks — Facebook, Amazon, Netflix, and Google parent Alphabet — are making a comeback. These two traders are avoiding two of them.

data.title: Jim Cramer on Alphabet’s Executive Shakeup, Marc Benioff and Mark Zuckerberg
data.text:
SUBSCRIBE | http://t.st/TheStreetTV

Jim Cramer weighs in on Larry Page stepping down as Alphabet's CEO, and how Marc Benioff, co-CEO of Salesforce has earned the trust of the consumers in a way that Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg hasn't been able to.

data.title: Instagram finally launches 13+ age checkups
data.text: Instagram is done playing dumb about users’ ages. After 9 years, Instagram is finally embracing more responsibility to protect underage kids from the problems with social media.

data.title: Almost Time to Sell FAANG Stocks
data.text: FAANG stocks are likely to face major headwinds in 2020, telling shareholders to consider taking profits in coming weeks.

data.title: 9 Stocks That Every 20-Year-Old Should Buy
data.text: Young people have a long-term horizon, so they can afford to take risks. But it's also crucial for 20-somethings to build wealth reliably.

data.title: Boris Johnson Affirms Plan To Tax Facebook, Google Despite Trump Retaliation
data.text: At the risk of provoking U.S. President Donald Trump, British Prime Minister Boris Johnson reiterated his intent to tax U.S. internet companies if his Conservative Party wins the national election this month.

data.title: Why You Should Still Consider Owning FANG Stocks
data.text: The Gang of Four has a lot of potential left, individually and together.

data.title: As Free Cash Flow Continues Rolling, So Will Facebook Stock
data.text: Acquisitions and increase in ARPU support Facebook stock in the long term

data.title: Podcasts and Travel Apps? Facebook Is Working on Those
data.text: The social network is exploring new product areas through a team dedicated to building the company’s future.
